content:
Insurance Account (Asset) Policy List Component

This component displays a list of policies attached to a specific account, along with key details such as policy name, number, total premium, and term.

The component is designed for Vlocity Insurance implementations using the Asset object model. It uses a FlexCard and Lightning Web Component (LWC) to display the policy information.

Key features:

* Displays icon, policy name link, policy number, total premium, and term
* Includes links to view details and see premium breakdown
* Pulls information from all policies connected to the specified account

FlexCard structure includes elements for displaying labels, text, fields, and actions. Custom CSS styles can be applied to change the look and feel.

This component has two states: Active (policies present) and Inactive (no policy present).

Data sources called by this component include Omnistudio Data Mapper named InsGetAccountPolicyList.

Users can click a link on the Insurance Account Policy List Component or the Insurance Account (Asset) Policy List Component to view additional information about the price of the policy.
title: Insurance Account Policy List Component
